adrFormatAddress: 192 Elizabeth St, New York, NY 10012, USA

originalText.text: Carson is an amazing hair stylist! He was able to completely transform my brassy, grown out, damaged hair into an absolute masterpiece. He is super thorough with his work, candid, personable, and extremely experienced. I would highly recommend that you go to Carson for all your balayage and haircut needs!

text.text: Carson is an amazing hair stylist! He was able to completely transform my brassy, grown out, damaged hair into an absolute masterpiece. He is super thorough with his work, candid, personable, and extremely experienced. I would highly recommend that you go to Carson for all your balayage and haircut needs!

originalText.text:
I've been getting my hair done with Wilson for the past few years and he always makes my hair look beautiful. I often get stopped on the street by strangers asking me where I get my hair done. The answer is with Wilson!

Wilson truly is an expert of color and his attention to detail is impeccable. Not only does my hair NEVER turn brassy (even if I go months between toning or dying), Wilson is incredibly attentive throughout the process. He takes the time to understand exactly what I want, discuss the options based on my hair's current state, and makes suggestions on what he think would look best based on my face shape and skin tone.

The end result? Absolutely stunning! I left the salon feeling like a million bucks, all thanks to Wilson's talent and thoughtful approach. Not only did my balayage turn out stunning, my hair felt healthy, silky, and vibrant.

If you're looking for a stylist who is a master of their craft, Wilson is the one to see. I can't recommend him enough!

originalText.text: Just got my roots touched up from Edwin (who did my initial bleach as well). He’s so patient and generous, and got my roots back to platinum from a dark brown. I waited about a month too long for the touch up so it wasn’t an easy task lifting my hair back up without breaking or banding, but he did an amazing job and I’m now back to a perfectly even palette for my pink hair :-) thanks Edwin!

text.text: Just got my roots touched up from Edwin (who did my initial bleach as well). He’s so patient and generous, and got my roots back to platinum from a dark brown. I waited about a month too long for the touch up so it wasn’t an easy task lifting my hair back up without breaking or banding, but he did an amazing job and I’m now back to a perfectly even palette for my pink hair :-) thanks Edwin!

originalText.text: I went for the first time to Hair Philosophy to get my hair done the other week. I have asian hair and for the past 5 years have loved staying blonde.I went to see Wilson and he was wonderful. He really listened to what I wanted and made sure to cater to the needs of my hair. He made me feel extremely comfortable and assured that I left the salon with my perfect hair and felt amazing. I highly recommend going to this salon and seeing Wilson. Thank you so much.

originalText.text: I visited hair philosophy during my lunch and I got paired up with Carson. These photos are the second time I visited and im so in love with the results!! Carson took his time and explained to me his process which made me more comfortable and confident with the end results. I will be visiting Carson when I need a touch up, recommending everyone I know to him as he’s super talented and a great person with a sense of humor✨☺️
